Class_Quest_Name_Always the Last Place Y: Always the Last Place You Look
Class_Skill_Desc_Aether Mortar: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 6,000 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Increases target's damage taken by 10%</br>Duration: 7s</br>Additional Effect: Creates a barrier that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 6,000 potency</br>Duration: 7s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Air Anchor: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 8,000.</br>Additional Effect: Bind</br>Duration: 3s</br>Additional Effect: Potency is increased by 50%, and the Bind effect becomes Stun while under the effect of Analysis</br>Duration: 3s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Chain Saw Primed</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Air Anchor Primed.</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.</br>※Action changes to Chain Saw while under the effect of Chain Saw Primed.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Analysis: Grants additional effects to Drill, Bioblaster, Air Anchor, and Chain Saw when these weaponskills are executed.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Drill Additional Effect: Potency is increased to 200%</br>Bioblaster Additional Effect: Doubles potency and afflicts target with Heavy +75%</br>Air Anchor Additional Effect: Potency is increased by 50% and the Bind effect becomes Stun</br>Chain Saw Additional Effect: Potency is increased by 50%</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Skill_Desc_Arm Punch: Delivers an attack with a potency of 120.</br>Potency increases as Battery Gauge exceeds required cost at time of deployment, up to a maximum of 240.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Arm's Length: Creates a barrier nullifying most knockback and draw-in effects.</br>Duration: 6s</br>Additional Effect: Slow +20% when barrier is struck</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Auto Crossbow: Delivers an attack with a potency of 140 to all enemies in a cone before you.</br>Can only be executed when firearm is Overheated.</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions. Upon execution, the recast timer for this action will be applied to all other weaponskills and magic actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Automaton Queen: Deploys an Automaton Queen to fight at your side.</br>Potency of Automaton Queen actions increases as Battery Gauge exceeds required cost at time of deployment.</br>Battery Gauge Cost: 50</br>Duration: 12s</br>Consumes Battery Gauge upon execution.</br>Shuts down when time expires or upon execution of Queen Overdrive.</br>Shares a recast timer with Queen Overdrive.
Class_Skill_Desc_Barrel Stabilizer: Increases Heat Gauge by 50.</br>Can only be executed while in combat.
Class_Skill_Desc_Bioblaster: Delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000 to all enemies in a cone before you.</br>Additional Effect: Doubles potency and afflicts target with Heavy +75% while under the effect of Analysis</br>Duration: 5s</br>Additional Effect: Damage over time</br>Potency: 4,000</br>Duration: 12s</br>Doubled potency does not apply to damage over time effect.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Air Anchor Primed</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Bioblaster Primed.</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.</br>※Action changes to Air Anchor while under the effect of Air Anchor Primed.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Bishop Autoturret: Deploys an area of effect battle turret which will deliver auto-attacks to enemies within range with a potency of 6,000.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Additional Effect: Increases target's damage taken by 10%</br>Duration: 7s</br>Additional Effect: Creates a barrier that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 6,000 potency</br>Duration: 7s
Class_Skill_Desc_Blast Charge: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 4,000.</br>Additional Effect: Grants a stack of Heat, up to a maximum of 5</br>Duration: 15s</br>At maximum stacks, grants Overheated and increases movement speed by 25%.</br>Duration: 5s</br>Requires casting time to execute. However, it is possible to walk while casting.</br>※Action changes to Heat Blast while under the effect of Overheated.
Class_Skill_Desc_Chain Saw: Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000 to all enemies in a straight line before you.</br>Potency is increased by 50% when target's HP is below 50%.</br>Additional Effect: Potency is increased by 50% while under the effect of Analysis</br>Additional Effect: Grants Drill Primed</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Chain Saw Primed.</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.</br>※Action changes to Drill while under the effect of Drill Primed.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Clean Shot: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.</br>Combo Action: Slug Shot or Heated Slug Shot</br>Combo Potency: 270</br>Combo Bonus: Increases Heat Gauge by 5//</br>Combo Bonus: Increases Battery Gauge by 10//
Class_Skill_Desc_Crowned Collider: Delivers an attack with a potency of 390.</br>Potency increases as Battery Gauge exceeds required cost at time of deployment, up to a maximum of 780.</br>The Automaton Queen shuts down after execution. If this action is not used manually while the Automaton Queen is active, it will be triggered automatically immediately before shutting down.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Detonator: Ends the effect of Wildfire, dealing damage to the target.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Drill: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 10,000.</br>Potency is increased to 20,000 while under the effect of Analysis.</br>Ignores the effects of Guard when dealing damage.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Bioblaster Primed</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Drill Primed.</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.</br>※Action changes to Bioblaster while under the effect of Bioblaster Primed.
Class_Skill_Desc_Flamethrower: Delivers damage over time to all enemies in a cone before you.</br>Potency: 80</br>Duration: 10s</br>Effect ends upon using another action or moving (including facing a different direction).</br>Cancels auto-attack upon execution.</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills upon execution. Cannot be executed during the cooldown of weaponskills.
Class_Skill_Desc_Foot Graze: Binds target.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Cancels auto-attack upon execution.</br>Target unbound if damage taken.
Class_Skill_Desc_Gauss Round: Delivers an attack with a potency of 130.</br>Maximum Charges: 3
Class_Skill_Desc_Head Graze: Interrupts the use of a target's action.
Class_Skill_Desc_Heat Blast: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 6,000.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Overheated.</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Heated Clean Shot: Delivers an attack with a potency of 120.</br>Combo Action: Heated Slug Shot</br>Combo Potency: 380</br>Combo Bonus: Increases Heat Gauge by 5//</br>Combo Bonus: Increases Battery Gauge by 10//
Class_Skill_Desc_Heated Slug Shot: Delivers an attack with a potency of 120.</br>Combo Action: Heated Split Shot</br>Combo Potency: 300</br>Combo Bonus: Increases Heat Gauge by 5//
Class_Skill_Desc_Heated Split Shot: Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Heat Gauge by 5//
Class_Skill_Desc_Hot Shot: Delivers an attack with a potency of 240.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Battery Gauge by 20//</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Hypercharge: Grants 5 stacks of Overheated, each stack allowing the execution of Heat Blast or Auto Crossbow///.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Overheated Effect: Increases the potency of single-target weaponskills by 20</br>Heat Gauge Cost: 50</br>Overheated effect only applicable to machinist job actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Marksman's Spite: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 36,000.</br>Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full.</br>Gauge Charge Time: 90s
Class_Skill_Desc_Peloton: Increases movement speed of self and nearby party members.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Effect ends when enmity is generated. Has no effect in battle.
Class_Skill_Desc_Pile Bunker: Delivers an attack with a potency of 340.</br>Potency increases as Battery Gauge exceeds required cost at time of deployment, up to a maximum of 680.</br>/The Automaton Queen shuts down after execution. If this action is not used manually while the Automaton Queen is active, it will be triggered automatically immediately before shutting down.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Queen Overdrive: Orders the Automaton Queen to use Pile Bunker.</br>Pile Bunker Potency: 340</br>Potency increases as Battery Gauge exceeds required cost at time of deployment, up to a maximum of 680.</br>The Automaton Queen shuts down after execution. If this action is not used manually while the Automaton Queen is active, it will be triggered automatically immediately before shutting down.</br>Shares a recast timer with Automaton Queen.
Class_Skill_Desc_Reassemble: Guarantees that next weaponskill is a critical direct hit.</br>Duration: 5s</br>Increases damage dealt when under an effect that raises critical hit rate or direct hit rate.</br>This action does not affect damage over time effects.</br>Maximum Charges: 2//
Class_Skill_Desc_Ricochet: Deals damage to all nearby enemies with a potency of 130 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Maximum Charges: 3
Class_Skill_Desc_Roller Dash: Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 240.</br>Potency increases as Battery Gauge exceeds required cost at time of deployment, up to a maximum of 480.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Rook Autoturret: Deploys a single-target battle turret which attacks using Volley Fire, dealing damage with a potency of 35.</br>Potency increases as Battery Gauge exceeds required cost at time of deployment, up to a maximum of 75.</br>Battery Gauge Cost: 50</br>Duration: 9s</br>Consumes Battery Gauge upon execution.</br>Shuts down when time expires or upon execution of Rook Overdrive.</br>Shares a recast timer with Rook Overdrive.
Class_Skill_Desc_Rook Overdrive: Orders the rook autoturret to use Rook Overload.</br>Rook Overload Potency: 160</br>Potency increases as Battery Gauge exceeds required cost at time of deployment, up to a maximum of 320.</br>The rook autoturret shuts down after execution. If this action is not used manually while the rook autoturret is active, it will be triggered automatically immediately before shutting down.</br>Shares a recast timer with Rook Autoturret.
Class_Skill_Desc_Rook Overload: Delivers an attack with a potency of 160.</br>Potency increases as Battery Gauge exceeds required cost at time of deployment, up to a maximum of 320.</br>The rook autoturret shuts down after execution. If this action is not used manually while the rook autoturret is active, it will be triggered automatically immediately before shutting down.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Scattergun: Delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000 to all enemies in a cone before you. Strikes twice when hitting only a single target.</br>Additional Effect: 10-yalm knockback</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Slug Shot: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.</br>Combo Action: Split Shot or Heated Split Shot</br>Combo Potency: 210</br>Combo Bonus: Increases Heat Gauge by 5//
Class_Skill_Desc_Split Shot: Delivers an attack with a potency of 140.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Heat Gauge by 5//
Class_Skill_Desc_Spread Shot: Delivers an attack with a potency of 140 to all enemies in a cone before you.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Heat Gauge by 5//
Class_Skill_Desc_Tactician: Reduces damage taken by self and nearby party members by 10%.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with bard's Troubadour or dancer's Shield Samba.
Class_Skill_Desc_Wildfire: Covers target's body in a slow-burning pitch. Deals damage to target and all enemies within 5 yalms when time expires.</br>Duration: 7s</br>Potency is increased by 4,000 for each of your own attack actions you land prior to the end of the effect. Landing 3 attack actions will cause the slow-burning pitch to detonate immediately.
Class_Status_Desc_Aether Mortar: A magicked barrier is nullifying damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Analysis: Gain an additional effect for the next Drill, Bioblaster, Air Anchor, or Chain Saw executed.
Class_Status_Desc_Arm's Length: Damage taken is reduced. Impervious to the next stun, sleep, bind, heavy, silence, knockback, or draw-in effect.
Class_Status_Desc_Wildfire: Damage is being accumulated with each weaponskill landed by the machinist who applied the effect.
Class_Trait_Desc_Charged Action Mastery: Allows a third charge of Gauss Round and Ricochet.
Class_Trait_Desc_Clean Shot Mastery: Upgrades Clean Shot to Heated Clean Shot.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Reassemble: Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Reassemble.</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Tactician: Reduces Tactician recast time to 90 seconds.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Wildfire: Improves Wildfire's potency increase for landing weaponskills to 240.
Class_Trait_Desc_Hot Shot Mastery: Upgrades Hot Shot to Air Anchor.
Class_Trait_Desc_Increased Action Damage: Increases base action damage and autoturret damage by 10%.
Increases base action damage and autoturret damage by 20%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Marksman's Mastery: Increases the potency of Heated Split Shot to 200, Heated Slug Shot to 120, and Heated Clean Shot to 120.
Class_Trait_Desc_Promotion: Upgrades Rook Autoturret and Rook Overdrive to Automaton Queen and Queen Overdrive respectively.
Class_Trait_Desc_Queen's Gambit: After executing Pile Bunker, the Automaton Queen will also execute Crowned Collider.
Class_Trait_Desc_Slug Shot Mastery: Upgrades Slug Shot to Heated Slug Shot.
Class_Trait_Desc_Split Shot Mastery: Upgrades Split Shot to Heated Split Shot.
